Package com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TreeIterables.TreeViewer<T>
    Provides a way of viewing any instance of T as a tree so long as there exists a method for converting the instance of T into a Collection of that instance's direct children.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HumanReadables
    Text converters for various Android objects.
    TreeIterables
    Utility methods for iterating over tree structured items.
    TreeIterables.DistanceRecordingTreeViewer<T>
    Provides a tree view of items of instance T and records their distance from a well known root.
    TreeIterables.ViewAndDistance
    Represents the distance a given view is from the root view.
    TreeIterables.ViewTreeViewer
    A TreeView providing access to the children of a given View.
    TreeIterablesTest
    Unit tests for TreeIterables.
